class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Student must contact Advising Support Center for permission numbers for enrollment.
course_description: This course introduces students to core principles and concepts of microbiology. Topic areas include microorganisms (bacteria, fungi, protozoa, viruses), microbial taxonomy, technology used to study microorganisms, microbial life cycle/metabolism and host-microbe interaction. Four hours of lecture and one three-hour laboratory per week.
